2. Nathan Bryan

Nathan Bryan
============

![Councilman Nathan Bryan standing in the municipal complex council chambers for a headshot photo](https://www.annatexas.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=10423)


About Council Member Nathan Bryan
---------------------------------

Councilman Nathan Bryan was born in Oak Cliff and later moved to Richardson, where he met his wife, Lynn, in high school. They lived in Garland before moving to Anna in 2006, raised two kids there, and are now enjoying being grandparents.

He served on the Anna City Council from May 2012 until November 2020. He started the push for the library in 2014 and has served on the Friends and Foundation board. He brings his years of management experience to the council, enabling him to listen to the neighbors and work to get their opinions heard and acted upon.



* Elected: June 2025
* End of Term: May 2028

[Contact Me](mailto:ntbryan@annatexas.gov)




![Anna, TX Homepage](https://www.annatexas.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=6403)
